评论详情: If you’ve been thinking about getting this set. Just get it!!! It’s soft, stretchy & oh so comfortable!! It’s thicker than I thought it was gonna be. It’s not a regular legging material. I love that the shirt is slightly oversized. I sometimes wear it off the shoulder. It has a deep V neck style shirt. So it’s super flattering. Great to just throw on & can dress up or down!

评论概述: If you usually wear size S or M, GET A SMALL
评论详情: For reference: 5’7” 145lbs. Like the title says, get a small if your size runs between small and medium. The outfit is very cute, but quite oversized (at least in the purple tone). The shorts crotch is long and I have to roll the waist over a few times to get it to sit at my waist. I think if I scrunch up the shorts legs then it’ll hit at a good spot on my legs. The shirt is definitely oversized and I think you’ll still be able to achieve the baggy look in the size small. It’s just extra baggy in the medium. I can only speak for the purple color, but if you’re debating, get the small. The material is better than I expected, definitely not too thin and flowy to where it seems cheap, but not so thick. Other people have been saying it feels like nurse scrubs material, but I disagree. Feels like a good quality cotton. Not too stiff, not too thin.

This two piece outfit was a literal lifesaver after birth. Super comfortable, cozy and love the color that I bought!! I definitely would recommend this for traveling, after birth outfit or comfy to where around the house. Love The material and not so weight to it.
Loved the look and comfort of material but sizing wrong. I'm 5’7” 130lbs and looked and felt too big with a small

评论概述: Love it. Oversized even if you’re curvy.
评论详情: I love this set. I bought it in multiple colors. It’s soft, thicker than I thought it would be, and so comfy! The shorts are not tight…the shirt long and oversized. You can wear it off shoulder if you’d like. The colors are spot on to what they look like. I usually wear size 16/18 and I bought an XL. Fits perfectly.

I’m genuinely confused by the rating of these sets. I had to write a review because I feel like most people must have received an entirely different product than I did. I bought this set in 4 colors: dark gray, light gray, chocolate brown and black. All of which are extremely itchy, too warm and thick for hot weather and not soft or breathable in anyway.  I have wash and worn each set multiple times and wish I hadn’t bought so many. They are okay for what I paid for them but I genuinely would rather not own them at all. The fit is okay. I sized up because I have big hips and a big butt and wanted it to still be flowly on me. I will say if you have a wider waist and don’t like things digging in then size up because the elasticized waist can be a bit tighter in some of the colorways. I have a smaller waist so this isn’t really a big issue for me but I thought it was worth mentioning.  For reference I am usually a large on bottom and medium on top and bought the set in an xl. The shorts fit slightly loose (which I prefer because I hate when things dig in) and the top is like a very short dress and very loose. I am 5’8 and actually like the fit of the top. The neckline is very wide and I wear it off the shoulder with a longline sports bra underneath.  I live in Oklahoma and this fabric is miserable in anything about 80 degree weather. Material is very scratchy against the skin and something I am constantly aware of. I rip this set off as soon as I done running my errands and home. I definitely feel like I sweat a lot more in these sets than a normal summer two piece casual set.  They wash fine and don’t shrink for me in the dryer but I prefer them laid flat to dry. Color ways are true color from the stock photos and they are way too thick to be see through in anyway. They will wrinkle if you just leave them bunched up but nothing too crazy. Overall I don’t recommend, sorry.

I was looking for a new, cute loungewear set and I came upon this and i couldn’t be happier with my choice.  It falls on the body very well and it’s cute enough to wear out and not just inside, material is good quality and I like the variety in colors they offer. Highly recommend this
There's a specific time when you can wear the set because the top is somewhat warm but the bottom is shorts.  It's a fleece like material. Good quality & color, though.  I bought the purple set.

I really like this set and it’s a great value for the money. I do wish it was a little bit more stretchy. It’s very comfortable and I washed it in cold water because of the dark color. I did love it so much that I bought a second color.

评论概述: Very cute, but not all that I hoped it would be
评论详情: For reference: I am 5’2”, weight bounces between 114 - 119, 34DD, and I usually wear a Small/size 4/26 or 27 inch jeans. The shirt is definitely an oversized fit - very cute, but you might pop out of the V-neck if you’re a restless sleeper. No issues for me with the waist of the shorts *but* the crotch is longer than the old school biking shorts I grew up wearing. That’s actually a plus in my book because *no* uncomfortable camel toe situation. The material wasn’t soft when first removed from package. It felt a little better after first washing, and either I have gotten used to it or it softened a bit after one night’s sleep. I sleep in a sports bra usually, so this will be perfect for rolling out of bed and going for an early morning walk or making the carpool run while the weather is still warm. I think I’ll buy a couple of sets more.
I wore this set as an outfit. It was cute and comfy. Great streach. Fit was perfect.

I have this set in so many colors, and I love it! I like my clothes to run a little oversized, so I size up. The shorts do end up being a bit big because of this reason, but the shirt covers almost all of the shorts leaving the bottom part showing. It ends up looking super cute and put together with practically 0 effort.

Love the color. Material is a little thicker than I would want. But I love the oversize of the top. Bottoms are not biker fit . But more like pull on shorts. Still baggy in some areas with a band at the waist. I usually just wear the top with other bottoms. I got on a deal price so I’m not as bummed about the shorts. I’m between large - xlarge. Got the xlarge.

评论概述: Not the best fabric, but cute
评论详情: The fabric is a polyester material, so it’s not super breathable or soft. Otherwise cute set.
Oversized, which is what I wanted. Like them
Very soft and comfortable. I bought a large but the top fell down really low I probably should have gone with medium but for pj's no problem.  Very comfortable.

The color is slightly different than the picture. The blue is darker than i expected. But it is very comfy! I ordered a small & the shirt fits oversized & was more like a medium. The shorts fit true to size.
5'3" 125lb postpartum and this was pretty big. I ended up giving it to my sister who is 6 months pregnant!

评论概述: The shorts fit a little tight
评论详情: The material is ok and color is good  but the shorts fit weird, like maybe the sew is wrong they are a little tight in the crotch. The shirts very drapy, and it hang off the shoulder like not in a comfortable way so the combination it’s a little weird . I think it is the sewing.

I have this set in light blue and kept it, but returned the pink. The color of the pink is more like a salmon and for me, it’s just not great. I thought I was getting more of a light pink. Other than the color, this is a perfect casual comfy set that you can dress up or down. Pair it with a sports bra for errand runs or hikes, or pair it with a dressier shoe, jewelry and an updo for going out. Plenty of room so it doesn’t stick to any body part that’s not flattering. Very light weight and very comfortable.
This set is super cute and always gets a lot of compliments! It runs a little big. The fabric is thick, but not see through. Very comfortable. Holds up good in wash.
The material is on the heavier and warmer side. It was good for the price but I was hoping it was a FP dupe. Definitely now. It was comfortable, I would buy again
Fabric is decent but feels like over a couple washes the shorts will loose elasticity.
I read reviews. Everyone said to sized up I went with a large over medium, it was huge. The shorts were huge. The shirt was decent size still a little too big to be stylish.
Very comfortable.

i didn’t get the shorts like the product claimed. the shirt is good material though, not too thick but no see through at all !!! perfect for my travel day. it’s super long & oversized, i would have probably sized down for the shirt if i had known the shorts were not coming.
Cute, comfy and casual two piece outfit. Fabric is thick, has some structure. Perfect for travel day, lounging around
The sizing is generous, definitely true to size. I wish the fabric had more cotton for a cooler feel. It feels more sweater like and would be good for cooler temperatures.

The material is really heavy and not what someone with night sweats should sleep in. Ever. The elastic on the shorts are very uncomfortable, especially after being washed. I trashed the shorts and wear the shirt on a comfy day with comfy pants.

评论概述: Small hole in the back of the shirt 👚
评论详情: Love the outfit! Super cute and soft! I took tags off and put the outfit on to discover a hole/snag/tear in the back of the shirt. I’m just wearing this for lounging and already removed the tags so I am not returning, but I do wish it had arrived in better condition.
This set is so cute! The fabric is soft and thick. Definitely recommend
These are ok just the neck is so big…

Took off 2 stars because the pieces aren’t the same color, and the shorts aren’t actually bike shorts. The colors are pretty though, and good quality. I made the mistake of sizing up, there is no need though. I will keep mine because the hassle to return is more than my knocking off 2 stars.

评论概述: Top way to big. Looked like a2x
评论详情: Way to big
Size is great.  Just material hold lint. Hard to keep

Color: I got the wine red and I would say it's more like brick red or maroon. It's fine; just not what I thought it would be.  Fabric: not especially soft, and heavier than I expected. I have other PJs from this company that have a softer feel.  Appearance: Boxy.  Bottom line: It's fine for pjs; just not as cute as I'd hoped.
Color is pretty
I’m 5’7 and weigh around 180. I carry most of my weight in my thighs and hips. I got a large and it fits but the shorts are tighter than I prefer for biker shorts but I still like the set.

评论概述: Top is functional, fabric is coarse
评论详情: I wanted to love this set but the fabric is somewhat coarse and the shorts are uncomfortable, tight band at the top that just doesn’t feel great postpartum. The top is functional for nursing and I do wear the top occasionally when nothing else is clean. I would recommend looking for a different set that’s more comfortable fabric.
Loved the fabric, and quality of the garment, but the size fits and feels larger than stated

评论概述: Shorts are not spandex and do not stretch.
评论详情: Love the look, very comfortable as I am pregnant, however, the shorts do not stretch and are a bit tight on my thighs.
As described but runs big. Color and style matched description
I got a small and top is over sized which I love but the shorts are tight and run smaller
The shirt is perfect fits great….great material… giving it 4 stars because the shorts are baggy

I got the Large because I like to wear baggy clothes to the gym, but a medium would have worked the best. The bottoms fit but the top looks like a dress. The fabric is pretty thick and I love the cut of the neckline.

Love this! I wasn’t sure or confident this would be good but with the great return policy and convenience of Amazon I decided to try them. OMG! I love them!! So comfortable! I am going to wear this for out and about, yoga, bed…!! I don’t do reviews so this says a lot!

it’s important to know you are getting what you order. This is a pajama not spandex material. This is such a cozy little outfit. It is my house uniform. The top is a little thicker than I was expecting but it does make it a good transition piece to run out of the house for a quick errand and still look put together. For the price, you’re getting a good value.
I love the material, it is very soft and stretchy but the top felt a little bit big on me but overall very cute, and worth the money!
Super comfy.
Great for the summer
Cute set, shorts were a little tight
Runs very big. Ordered a large and I’m swimming in it. I would size down next time.
Very comfortable!
Needed a light lounging PJ. You can wear it for bed or stay in it all day long. Very comfortable.

This set is super soft and good quality! Very much free people dupe and will definitely order in more colors. I normally order an XL for oversized looks and I went with an XL. The shorts are kinda loose but I like that they’re not skin tight biker shorts and the top is perfectly oversized. 10/10 recommend!
Too is very oversized. Nice color, soft & comfy!

i had bought this as a gift for my friend for her birthday after she had complimented mine, she cannot stop raving about it! super comfy style, easy to just throw on and go. could be dressed up or down in our opinion but is a great staple for any athleisure lover like us

Fit is very oversized for the top. I got a large and it is too big for me to wear. I suggest sizing down. The material is nice and seems like good quality. I wanted something comfy to wear postpartum. For size reference I’m 190lbs and should have gotten a medium
Did not wear for pajamas. More as an athlete set. Very comfy material. And stretchy
Such a flattering set and is perfect for being pregnant. The material isn’t too thick but still light and airy while being stretchy to help with your growing bump. Great value for your money!
This is cute but she shorts are awful, not comfortable at all. The top is great, I wish I could just buy the top.
I love my pajamas they are so comfortable to sleep in it stretches with my body the fabric is so soft I brought it in 3 different colors

评论概述: Top runs big, shorts are small, size up
评论详情: Soft, comfortable
I love the color and the fabric is very nice. I wish it had a wider waistband that didn’t dig in so much. Also, the v-neck is pretty deep.

This set it adorbs! Top runs very oversized and the v-neck is very large but wearing it off the shoulder with a bralett made a cute outfit.  I could’ve sized down but kept my normal size. Material is a little thicker, so not the coolest for mid-summer in the heat but perfect for AC or early/late summer.
Love the fit but the polyester fabric made me itch.

This outfit is so cute and fit so comfortably. I love the oversize look. I ordered a size medium, which fits me perfectly. I’m 5’6 and way around 140 lbs. I love that the packaging was so easy to open, but also secure. Such a great value for such a great price. It is light weight and breathable for the summer.
My favorite apartment pj lounge wear.Great for fall season...not too hot or cold.Fabric so nice and pretty.

Love this set. Normally I buy a large. This was too big tho so I returned for medium and it’s perfect. I’m 5’6” and about 155 lbs for reference. The top could have worked but the bottoms were way too big. The medium top is perfect, the bottoms are comfy.
The set is nice but I was expecting the shorts to be more spandex  They are just shorts not very tight in my legs

So I bought this as PJ's but I have worn it as my "Home Uniform" since I got it.  It is totally adorable and I grocery shop, clothes shop lunch with the girls in this outfit.  I need another set in other colors it is so cute.

I love this comfy cozy pajama set! It’s flattering and fits perfectly. I love the oversize fit of the top contrasting the close fit of the bottoms and the color is lovely too. The material is soft and it’s washed really well, and dried with no issues. Good purchase!
Every time I wear this, people say something positive about it and ask if it’s “that Amazon outfit” Cute, Stylish and comfy

I really liked the way it fits, however the fabric (even after 3 washes) was too itchy for me. I tried washing severeal times, which means I can not return it, but it just didn't make it less itchy for me.  Very disappointing because I really like the set.

评论概述: Shirt way too long overall it’s CHEAP!
评论详情: Cute concept but not as pictured! The outfit I received looks like a different fabric, feels cheap, and the shirt is way longer than what it looks like in the picture. Shipping took over a week. I ordered black and pink, the pink still hasn’t arrived and it says I won’t get it until middle of August. I’m 5,5 and about 140lbs ordered a medium and it fits fine. The top is oversized and not in a good way. It feels strange under the arms and the V neck goes way down between the boobs and shows my bra. The shorts fit perfect but feels cheap! I would not recommend this to anyone.

I originally bought this product because I liked the way the shirt looked. To my suprise it came with shorts too! I love the shirt. Fabric is stretchy, light but still thick enough not to be see through. I am definitely buying again in more colors!
I ordered a large and the shirt was really over sized but the shirt were good.
Super cute set! The shorts aren’t cute by themselves but everything is so comfy
Feel cute and trendy running errands or great for casual outings

The fit and design of this set is good, color is pretty too. But i was really disappointed after just one time of wearing it, the material looked worn between the legs, under the arms, pilling all over. It is not worth the money to wear just one time. Do not buy.

评论概述: Not linen which is what I was wanting
评论详情: This stretchy outfit is definitely comfortable, but it’s a dog hair magnet and I love like a scullery maid in it.  I wish Amazon would stick to the specified material and STOP throwing other crap in the mix.  I wanted linen and got THIS.  Not happy.
Super soft and cool material! The top is over sized. I’m 5’4 150 pounds and would have felt more comfortable in a medium than a large. Size down if in between sizes
The fabric is soft, and does run on the large size but it's the whole point of being comfy. I love the top, I love the cut. I just ordered another color.

评论概述: Downsize at least two to three sizes
评论详情: While I do like my loungewear loose I must say this is to the extreme! I usually take a large and it fits like a xxxl ! I ordered two of them and while the colors are really nice I will wear it as a nightshirt before bed!  Material a touch stiff but I will wash them both and hope that they not only soften but also shrink!

Bought this set in two colors for post partum. Love them so much! They’re extremely comfortable and the shorts are nice and high rise. The set looks much more expensive than it is, in my opinion. The elastic band on the waistband is also very comfortable!

评论概述: Shorts Way Too Big on my Legs
评论详情: If you have skinny legs, this is not for you. The shorts looked like poorly fitted regular shorts instead of bike shorts on me. Which is a shame because I actually loved the fit of the top!
It’s super comfy and I’m still wearing it at 38 weeks. Needless to say the top is super oversized so I’m curious if I can still wear it all after baby comes …
The best set… I just bought 3 more colors today. Most flattering outfit for postpartum women. Elastic sits high enough that it does not interfere with csection scars.. chefs kiss.
I am 8.5 months pregnant and the XL fits very comfortably! Fits great and I’m so thankful I ordered. I plan to order more!
Pills after washing and fades quickly.
This set is wonderful. The quality of the clothing is great thick material. Definitely going to buy it another colors. Would highly recommend.

This set will be my absolute go to this summer! I ordered it in 3 different colors - the orange pink is actually closer to a sherbet color orange but it is very pretty. I ordered the blue and the light grey...I love them!
I was skeptical with the oversized fit but I love love love this set! I have them in multiple colors. They fit true to size and really flattering.
Bought for a GREAT maternity set!
I love this cute little set! High waisted shorts with compression and a loose fitting top with a flattering neckline. Ordered a medium and I’m normally a large on top.
Love the oversize fit of the top.  Fabric is thicker than expected for the price. Shorts are cotton but still fit like a true biker short.
Love the color and fit. Easy outfit to grab and throw on while still looking cute. Great value and so soft.
So comfy and looks great! I’m 5’3 and weigh 154 lbs and the medium fit perfectly! Going to buying more!
The fabric is amazing, so is this comfortability. I love how you can dress up this outfit or just simply be. It’s not too thick of material, it’s breathable.
This outfit is too comfortable and too cute!! Can dress up or dress down either way it is a win!
